main event: A round, large object as big as a small aircraft was seen over Sioux City, Iowa, emitting a red flame and smoke from the rear.
interesting points: The object was seemingly engulfed in flames, but the flames went out very suddenly, leaving only a smoke trail.
The object was at an altitude of around 1,000 feet and flying in a level path sloping towards the ground, moving from south to north.
The sighting lasted for 1 to 1.5 minutes and was observed with the naked eye.
The weather conditions were cloudy and overcast, with a strong inversion between 4,200-5,500 feet.
The observer was a 53-year-old reliable witness, a dictatphone operator.
sighted object: A round, large object as big as a small aircraft
witnesses: A single reliable witness, a 53-year-old dictatphone operator
